job_description: At EY, we value unique perspectives and offer a launchpad for personal and professional growth. job_description: Agilent is seeking an Applications Chemist Intern to support the development of application solutions and sales collateral for molecular spectroscopy products. The role involves creating content for digital marketing programs, working with product marketing, commercial marketing, and application development teams, and collaborating closely with other functions. The successful candidate will work hands-on with latest generation molecular spectroscopy instruments, design and execute experiments, analyze samples, and create written and visual content.

job_title: Machine Learning Engineer Intern (Trust & Safety) - 2024 Nov/Dec Start
job_description: TikTok is looking for talented individuals to join its engineering team for an internship in November/December 2024. As part of this team, interns will develop state-of-the-art machine learning models and algorithms to protect the platform and users from content that violates community guidelines. Responsibilities include building industry-leading content safety systems, developing scalable classifiers and tools, improving trust and safety strategy, and working with cross-functional teams. To apply, candidates must be currently pursuing a degree/master's in computer science or a related field, have relevant experience in machine learning, data mining, or computer vision, and be passionate about solving challenging problems.
discipline: Computer Science, Engineering, Engineering Software

job_description: Agilent is seeking an Intern Chemist to join the Atomic Spectroscopy Marketing Team, based in Mulgrave, Australia. The team builds on scientific theories and marketing principles to design and implement marketing strategies for new products. The successful candidate will work hands-on with instruments, write application notes and papers, and deliver presentations. The role requires a university degree in Chemistry or equivalent, entering the final year, with skills in Atomic Spectroscopy and experience in laboratory settings. The ideal candidate has excellent communication skills, leadership capabilities, and a proactive attitude.
discipline: Computer Science, Data Science and Analytics,
